item.description:
Meet fellow Social Networkers near you!

 

Welcome to 40/50 Something Year Olds – Men & Women Social Networking

Come to a local Social Networking Meetup for fun, interesting conversation and a lot of laughs! Join us to broaden your social circle and meet new friends. Men and women whom are 40+ year olds getting together for dining, conversation and actives of all kinds. Most of all, if you have a great sense of humor and like meeting new people, you'll like this group.

We want everyone to feel welcome,and that means we are committed to having everyone feel comfortable, as well as safe. If it's your first time to one of our events, please don't be afraid that you won't know anyone.  We will make sure you are welcome.

Costs: To initially join the group costs $10.00.
A group fee of $10.00 will be charged every six months to maintain the group and pay the Meetup site fee. Charges occurring on January 31 and July 31.

There will be no additional Meetup fees to attend an event; however there may be fees associated with participating in an activity itself.

40/50 Something Year Olds – Men & Women Social Networking
Principles and Requirements

1. RSVP "YES" only when they are 100% sure they can attend.

2. Arrive on time and never "No Show." Members who "No Show" take away RSVP slots from other members and negatively impact events. If you are unable to attend please change your RSVP at least 24 hours in advance.

3. 'No Shows' WILL NOT be tolerated and will be removed from 40/50 Something Year Olds – Men & Women Social Networking

By choosing to join 40/50 Something Year Olds – Men & Women Social Networking you understand and will abide by the items listed above

==================================================

DISCLAIMER:During all events Members are responsible for themselves. The Organizer and Assistant Organizers are not responsible for the safety of the participants. We will try our best to prevent accidents, but are not responsible or liable if something happens to you. By joining the group, you acknowledge this. Thanks
item.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking
